content: <metadata>   <idinfo>     <citation>       <citeinfo>         <origin>City and County of Denver, Technology Services / GIS Data; Public Works - Plans Review Services</origin>         <title>Addresses</title>         <geoform>vector digital data</geoform>         <othercit>Data updated daily.</othercit>       </citeinfo>     </citation>     <descript>       <abstract>This data layer comprises active addresses found in the Denver Address Database. Addresses included in this file may or not be mailable addresses.</abstract>       <purpose>The address layer was created to provide addresses for general public consumption.   </purpose>       <supplinf>These are structure, utility, and land addresses. The addresses should not be used as mailable addresses.</supplinf>     </descript>     <status>       <progress>In work</progress>       <update>Daily</update>     </status>     <spdom>       <bounding>         <westbc>-105.362124</westbc>         <eastbc>-104.60092</eastbc>         <northbc>39.908998</northbc>         <southbc>39.611664</southbc>       </bounding>     </spdom>     <keywords>       <theme>         <themekt>None</themekt>         <themekey>address</themekey>         <themekey>subaddress</themekey>         <themekey>property</themekey>       </theme>       <theme>         <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Categories</themekt>         <themekey>location</themekey>       </theme>       <place>         <placekt>None</placekt>         <placekey>Denver</placekey>         <placekey>Denver County</placekey>         <placekey>Colorado</placekey>         <placekey>USA</placekey>       </place>     </keywords>     <accconst>None</accconst>     <useconst>ACCESS CONSTRAINTS:  This data set is provided as read-only. Contact the GIS Data Administrator for more information on distribution requirements/restrictions.     USE CONSTRAINTS:  The City and County of Denver is not responsible and shall not be liable to the user for damages of any kind arising out of the use of data or information provided by the City and County of Denver, including the installation of the data or information, its use, or the results obtained from its use.   ANY DATA OR INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE City and County of Denver IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  Data or information provided by the City and County of Denver shall be used and relied upon only at the user's sole risk, and the user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the City and County of Denver, its officials, officers and employees from any liability arising out of the use of the data/information provided.   NOT FOR ENGINEERING PURPOSES </useconst>     <datacred>City and County of Denver, Technology Services / GIS Data; Public Works - Plans Review Services</datacred>     <secinfo>       <secsys>AVAILABLE</secsys>       <secclass>Unclassified</secclass>       <sechandl>Available to the general public and posted on the Denver FTP (File Transfer Protocol) site.</sechandl>     </secinfo>     <native>Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.2.3200</native>   </idinfo>   <dataqual />   <spdoinfo>     <direct>Vector</direct>     <ptvctinf>       <sdtsterm>         <sdtstype>Entity point</sdtstype>         <ptvctcnt>275829</ptvctcnt>       </sdtsterm>     </ptvctinf>   </spdoinfo>   <spref>     <horizsys>       <geograph>         <latres>8.9831528411952133e-009</latres>         <longres>8.9831528411952133e-009</longres>         <geogunit>Decimal Degrees</geogunit>       </geograph>       <geodetic>         <horizdn>D WGS 1984</horizdn>         <ellips>WGS 1984</ellips>         <semiaxis>6378137.0</semiaxis>         <denflat>298.257223563</denflat>       </geodetic>     </horizsys>   </spref>   <eainfo>     <detailed>       <enttyp>         <enttypl>SD_CITY_LOC_ADDRESSES_P</enttypl>       </enttyp>       <attr>         <attrlabl>OBJECTID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Internal feature number.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ADDRESS_TYPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Describes the type of address - Associated (A), Land (L), Structure (S), or Utility (U).</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Public Works, Plans Review Services</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>X_COORD</attrlabl>         <attrdef>State Plane X Coordinate.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>Y_COORD</attrlabl>         <attrdef>State Plane Y Coordinate.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>LATITUDE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Latitude Coordinate.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>LONGITUDE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Longitude Coordinate.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ADDRESS_NUMBER_PREFIX</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The portion of the Complete Address Number which precedes the Address Number itself.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Federal Geographic Data Committee (FGDC) United States Thoroughfare, Landmark and Postal Data Address Standard Content document.</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ADDRESS_NUMBER</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The numeric identifier for a land parcel, house, building or other location along a thoroughfare or within a community.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Federal Geographic Data Committee (FGDC) United States Thoroughfare, Landmark and Postal Data Address Standard Content document.</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ADDRESS_NUMBER_SUFFIX</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The portion of the Complete Address Number which follows the Address Number itself.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Federal Geographic Data Committee (FGDC) United States Thoroughfare, Landmark and Postal Data Address Standard Content document.</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>PREMODIFIER</attrlabl>         <attrdef>A word or phrase that precedes the Street Name and is not a Street Name Pre Directional or a Street Name Pre Type.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Federal Geographic Data Committee (FGDC) United States Thoroughfare, Landmark and Postal Data Address Standard Content document.</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>PREDIRECTIONAL</attrlabl>         <attrdef>A word preceding the street name that indicates the directional taken by the thoroughfare from an arbitrary starting point, or the sector where it is located.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Federal Geographic Data Committee (FGDC) United States Thoroughfare, Landmark and Postal Data Address Standard Content document.</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>STREET_NAME</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Official name of a street as assigned by a local governing authority, or an alternate (alias) name that is used and recognized, excluding street types, directionals, and modifiers.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Federal Geographic Data Committee (FGDC) United States Thoroughfare, Landmark and Postal Data Address Standard Content document.</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>POSTTYPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The element of the complete street name following the street name element that indicates the type of street (i.e. Ave, Blvd, Cir, Cres, Ct, Dr, Hwy, Ln, Pkwy, Pl, Rd, St, Way).  This list is NOT exhaustive.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Federal Geographic Data Committee (FGDC) United States Thoroughfare, Landmark and Postal Data Address Standard Content document.</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>POSTDIRECTIONAL</attrlabl>         <attrdef>A word following the street name that indicates the directional taken by the thoroughfare from an arbitrary starting point, or the sector where it is located.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Federal Geographic Data Committee (FGDC) United States Thoroughfare, Landmark and Postal Data Address Standard Content document.</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>POSTMODIFIER</attrlabl>         <attrdef>A word or phrase that follows the Street Name but is not a Street Name Post Type or Street Name Post Directional.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Federal Geographic Data Committee (FGDC) United States Thoroughfare, Landmark and Postal Data Address Standard Content document.</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>BUILDING_TYPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Reference to the primary structure (i.e. Building).</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Public Works, Plans Review Services</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>BUILDING_IDENTIFIER</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Numeric identifier to uniquely identify a structure.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Public Works, Plans Review Services</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>UNIT_TYPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Secondary unit designator (i.e. #, Apt, Bldg, Bsmt, Dept, Fl, Front, Gar, Lbby, Lot, Lower, Ph, Rear, Rm, Spc, Ste, Unit, Upper).  This list is NOT exhaustive.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>United States Postal Service (USPS)</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>UNIT_IDENTIFIER</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Numeric identifier that provides a unique number to a unit.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Public Works, Plans Review Services</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>COMPOSITE_UNIT_TYPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Secondary unit designator  (i.e. #, Apt, Bldg, Bsmt, Dept, Fl, Front, Gar, Lbby, Lot, Lower, Ph, Rear, Rm, Spc, Ste, Unit, Upper).  This list is NOT exhaustive.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Public Works, Plans Review Services</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>COMPOSIT_UNIT_IDENTIFIER</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Numeric identifier that provides a unique number to a unit.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Public Works, Plans Review Services</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>FULL_ADDRESS</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Complete address.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Public Works, Plans Review Services</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SHAPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Feature geometry.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Coordinates defining the features.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>     </detailed>   </eainfo>   <distinfo>     <distrib>       <cntinfo>         <cntorgp>           <cntorg>City and County of Denver, Technology Services / GIS Data</cntorg>         </cntorgp>         <cntaddr>           <addrtype>unknown</addrtype>           <address>201 W Colfax Ave, Dept 301</address>           <city>Denver</city>           <state>CO</state>           <postal>80202</postal>           <country>US</country>         </cntaddr>         <cntfax>720-913-5237</cntfax>         <cntemail>denvergis@denvergov.org</cntemail>         <hours>M-F 8:00am - 4:30pm (MT)</hours>       </cntinfo>     </distrib>     <distliab>See access and use constraints information.</distliab>     <stdorder>       <fees>This information is available at a time and material cost from the City and County of Denver. </fees>       <ordering>Digital products can be downloaded for free using the FTP site or can be requested by filing out the GIS Data Request Form and faxing it to (720) 913-5237, ATTN: Data Sales. All digital orders will be confirmed and processed by DenverGIS.  Use our online request form and acknowledge the GIS ordinance to download publically available GIS digital data. Please reference the following link - http://www.denvergov.org/gis and click on Products and Services, then click on Data Sales.; Technical Prerequisites: It is recommended to use DSL or T1 connections to download the information. If dial-up is used, please expect longer download times or incomplete data downloads.</ordering>       <turnarnd>10 working days.</turnarnd>     </stdorder>   </distinfo>   <metainfo>     <metd>20150318</metd>     <metstdn>FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata</metstdn>     <metstdv>FGDC-STD-001-1998</metstdv>     <mettc>local time</mettc>   </metainfo> </metadata>
